org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Interface IStorageModule<ConfigType extends StorageConfig>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IObsStorageModule<ConfigType>, IRecordStorageModule<ConfigType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicStorageImpl, GenericStreamStorage, InMemoryBasicStorage, MultiEntityStorageImpl, ObsStorageImpl

    public interface IStorageModule<ConfigType extends StorageConfig>
extends IModule<ConfigType>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backup(OutputStream os)
      Backups storage to specified output stream
      void commit()
      Commits all changes generated by transactional methods since the last commit event
      boolean isAutoCommit()
      Retrieves auto-commit state
      void restore(InputStream is)
      Restores storage from backup obtained from specified input stream
      void rollback()
      Cancels all changes generated by transactional methods since the last commit event
      void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit)
      Changes the storage behavior on record insertion, update or deletion
      void sync(IStorageModule<?> storage)
      Synchronizes storage with another storage of the same type (potentially remote)

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sensorhub.api.module.IModule

        cleanup, getConfiguration, getLocalID, getName, init, isEnabled, loadState, registerListener, saveState, start, stop, unregisterListener, updateConfig

             throws IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        IOException

      • setAutoCommit

        void setAutoCommit(boolean autoCommit)
        Changes the storage behavior on record insertion, update or deletion
        Parameters:
        autoCommit - true to commit changes automatically when a transactional method is called, false if the commit() method should be called manually to persist changes to storage.

      • isAutoCommit

        boolean isAutoCommit()
        Retrieves auto-commit state
        Returns:
        true if auto-commit is enabled on this storage

      • commit

        void commit()
        Commits all changes generated by transactional methods since the last commit event

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Cancels all changes generated by transactional methods since the last commit event
